content.en: Web spam detection: Researchers have developed algorithms to detect and combat web spam, such as spam web pages and link spamming. These algorithms use various techniques, including link analysis, tag-based methods, browsing behavior information, content-based information, trust-distrust propagation, and weight properties. By incorporating these algorithms, researchers aim to improve the accuracy and reliability of spam detection in online systems.
content.da: Webspam-detektion: Forskere har udviklet algoritmer til at opdage og bekæmpe webspam, såsom spam-websider og linkspam. Disse algoritmer bruger forskellige teknikker, herunder linkanalyse, tag-baserede metoder, information om browsingadfærd, indholdsbaseret information, tillid-mistillid-propagation og vægt-egenskaber. Ved at inkorporere disse algoritmer sigter forskerne mod at forbedre nøjagtigheden og pålideligheden af spam-detektion i online systemer.
